DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , randomize , double blind study , needle tip needle shaft visibility echogenic nonechogenic needle compare ultrasound guided infraclavicular brachial plexus block . Sixty patient schedule upper extremity surgery include study . Patients randomise two group , group E ( Echogenic ) group NE ( Nonechogenic ) 30 subject group . Under ultrasound guidance infraclavicular brachial plexus block perform . In Group E , Pajunk Sonoplex echogenic needle use Group NE , Stimuplex Braun nonechogenic needle use . The subjective assessment needle tip/shaft visibility score performer objective assessment record block procedure video note .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Echogenic Nonechogenic Needles Ultrasound Guided Infraclavicular Brachial Plexus Block
DOC.detailed_description: The aim investigator study find good among echogenic nonechogenic needle needle tip/shaft visibility block success rate ultrasound guide infraclavicular brachial plexus block . Sixty patient randomize two group , Group E ( echogenic group ) Group NE ( nonechogenic group ) thirty patient group . The ultrasound imaging nerve block video record later analysis . Recording commenced skin puncture stop time final needle removal ( total block time ) . After block performer ask subjectively score percentage time visualize needle tip needle shaft 5 point scale ( 1 = 0 % -20 % , 2 = 20 % -40 % , 3 = 40 % - 60 % , 4 = 60 % -80 % , 5 = 80 % -100 % ) . The record video later analyse investigator . An objective measurement percentage needle tip visibility needle shaft visibility calculate nerve block use formula , Time view ( needle tip ) / total block time x 100 Time view ( needle shaft ) / total block time x 100 The subjective assessment needle tip/shaft visibility score performer objective assessment record block procedure video note . Other block parameter also compare .
DOC.criteria: 1860 year , male female schedule upper extremity surgery Clinically significant coagulopathy Local anesthetic allergy Preexisting motor sensory deficit operative limb Uncontrolled hypertension unstable Ischemic Heart disease Body mass index > 35 Patients needs general anaesthesia surgery
